question: Ahsan Manzil Palace in Dhaka, is known for which among the following landmarks in Modern Indian History?
option1: Establishment of All India Muslim League
answer: Establishment of All India Muslim League
explanation: Ahsan Manzil was the official resident and seat of the Nawab of Dhaka. It is located along the banks of the Buriganga River in Dhaka. The conference of 1906 was held in this place where the foundation of the Muslim League was laid.
